titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring His Maiesties pleasure concerning Sir VValter Ravvleigh, and those who aduentured vvith him
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, deputie printers for the Kings Most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our mannor of Greenwich, the ninth day of Iune, in the sixteenth yeere of our raigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the one and fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
